name: Orbital Decay (m3gasn1p3r)
description:
A game-jam game for Lame-Jam 14, themed around Gravity, this game is about saving life-pods left in a planet's orbit from that very thing. 

link to the Game Jam: https://itch.io/jam/lame-jam-14/entries

sound effects: Chiptone (SFB games)

While your ship may seem slow and sluggish at times, there are a variety of powerups you can use to move more nimbly, and you don't have to collect every single lifepod, luckily, as there is an element of randomness to them.

The game features four powerups, four main obstacles, and a 2-minute endurance test of your piloting skills.

Can you be a true hero and save those pods?
